00061 template <typename TReal>
00062 aiMatrix4x4t<TReal> ::aiMatrix4x4t () :
00063     a1(1.0f), a2(), a3(), a4(),
00064     b1(), b2(1.0f), b3(), b4(),
00065     c1(), c2(), c3(1.0f), c4(),
00066     d1(), d2(), d3(), d4(1.0f)
00067 {
00068 
00069 }

00071 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 template <typename TReal>
00073 aiMatrix4x4t<TReal> ::aiMatrix4x4t (TReal _a1, TReal _a2, TReal _a3, TReal _a4,
00074               TReal _b1, TReal _b2, TReal _b3, TReal _b4,
00075               TReal _c1, TReal _c2, TReal _c3, TReal _c4,
00076               TReal _d1, TReal _d2, TReal _d3, TReal _d4) :

00079     c1(_c1), c2(_c2), c3(_c3), c4(_c4),
00080     d1(_d1), d2(_d2), d3(_d3), d4(_d4)
00081 {
00082 
00083 }

00085 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 template <typename TReal>
00087 template <typename TOther>
00088 aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::operator aiMatrix4x4t<TOther> () const
00089 {
00090     return aiMatrix4x4t<TOther>(static_cast<TOther>(a1),static_cast<TOther>(a2),static_cast<TOther>(a3),static_cast<TOther>(a4),
00091         static_cast<TOther>(b1),static_cast<TOther>(b2),static_cast<TOther>(b3),static_cast<TOther>(b4),
00092         static_cast<TOther>(c1),static_cast<TOther>(c2),static_cast<TOther>(c3),static_cast<TOther>(c4),
00093         static_cast<TOther>(d1),static_cast<TOther>(d2),static_cast<TOther>(d3),static_cast<TOther>(d4));
00094 }

00097 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 template <typename TReal>
00099 inline aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::aiMatrix4x4t (const aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& m)
00100 {
00101     a1 = m.a1; a2 = m.a2; a3 = m.a3; a4 = static_cast<TReal>(0.0);
00102     b1 = m.b1; b2 = m.b2; b3 = m.b3; b4 = static_cast<TReal>(0.0);
00103     c1 = m.c1; c2 = m.c2; c3 = m.c3; c4 = static_cast<TReal>(0.0);
00104     d1 = static_cast<TReal>(0.0); d2 = static_cast<TReal>(0.0); d3 = static_cast<TReal>(0.0); d4 = static_cast<TReal>(1.0);
00105 }
00106 
00107 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 template <typename TReal>
00109 inline aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::aiMatrix4x4t (const aiVector3t<TReal>& scaling, const aiQuaterniont<TReal>& rotation, const aiVector3t<TReal>& position)
00110 {
00111     // build a 3x3 rotation matrix
00112     aiMatrix3x3t<TReal> m = rotation.GetMatrix();
00113 
00114     a1 = m.a1 * scaling.x;
00115     a2 = m.a2 * scaling.x;
00116     a3 = m.a3 * scaling.x;
00117     a4 = position.x;
00118 
00119     b1 = m.b1 * scaling.y;
00120     b2 = m.b2 * scaling.y;
00121     b3 = m.b3 * scaling.y;
00122     b4 = position.y;
00123 
00124     c1 = m.c1 * scaling.z;
00125     c2 = m.c2 * scaling.z;
00126     c3 = m.c3 * scaling.z;
00127     c4= position.z;
00128 
00129     d1 = static_cast<TReal>(0.0);
00130     d2 = static_cast<TReal>(0.0);
00131     d3 = static_cast<TReal>(0.0);
00132     d4 = static_cast<TReal>(1.0);
00133 }
00134 
00135 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136 template <typename TReal>
00137 inline aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::operator *= (const aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& m)
00138 {
00139     *this = aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>(
00140         m.a1 * a1 + m.b1 * a2 + m.c1 * a3 + m.d1 * a4,
00141         m.a2 * a1 + m.b2 * a2 + m.c2 * a3 + m.d2 * a4,
00142         m.a3 * a1 + m.b3 * a2 + m.c3 * a3 + m.d3 * a4,
00143         m.a4 * a1 + m.b4 * a2 + m.c4 * a3 + m.d4 * a4,
00144         m.a1 * b1 + m.b1 * b2 + m.c1 * b3 + m.d1 * b4,
00145         m.a2 * b1 + m.b2 * b2 + m.c2 * b3 + m.d2 * b4,
00146         m.a3 * b1 + m.b3 * b2 + m.c3 * b3 + m.d3 * b4,
00147         m.a4 * b1 + m.b4 * b2 + m.c4 * b3 + m.d4 * b4,
00148         m.a1 * c1 + m.b1 * c2 + m.c1 * c3 + m.d1 * c4,
00149         m.a2 * c1 + m.b2 * c2 + m.c2 * c3 + m.d2 * c4,
00150         m.a3 * c1 + m.b3 * c2 + m.c3 * c3 + m.d3 * c4,
00151         m.a4 * c1 + m.b4 * c2 + m.c4 * c3 + m.d4 * c4,
00152         m.a1 * d1 + m.b1 * d2 + m.c1 * d3 + m.d1 * d4,
00153         m.a2 * d1 + m.b2 * d2 + m.c2 * d3 + m.d2 * d4,
00154         m.a3 * d1 + m.b3 * d2 + m.c3 * d3 + m.d3 * d4,
00155         m.a4 * d1 + m.b4 * d2 + m.c4 * d3 + m.d4 * d4);
00156     return *this;
00157 }

00188         m.a1 + a1,

00210 {
00211     aiMatrix4x4t<TReal> temp( *this);
00212     temp *= m;
00213     return temp;

00217 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00218 template <typename TReal>
00219 inline aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::Transpose()
00220 {
00221     // (TReal&) don't remove, GCC complains cause of packed fields
00222     std::swap( (TReal&)b1, (TReal&)a2);
00223     std::swap( (TReal&)c1, (TReal&)a3);
00224     std::swap( (TReal&)c2, (TReal&)b3);
00225     std::swap( (TReal&)d1, (TReal&)a4);
00226     std::swap( (TReal&)d2, (TReal&)b4);
00227     std::swap( (TReal&)d3, (TReal&)c4);
00228     return *this;
00229 }
00230 
00231 
00232 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00233 template <typename TReal>
00234 inline TReal aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::Determinant() const
00235 {
00236     return a1*b2*c3*d4 - a1*b2*c4*d3 + a1*b3*c4*d2 - a1*b3*c2*d4
00237         + a1*b4*c2*d3 - a1*b4*c3*d2 - a2*b3*c4*d1 + a2*b3*c1*d4
00238         - a2*b4*c1*d3 + a2*b4*c3*d1 - a2*b1*c3*d4 + a2*b1*c4*d3
00239         + a3*b4*c1*d2 - a3*b4*c2*d1 + a3*b1*c2*d4 - a3*b1*c4*d2
00240         + a3*b2*c4*d1 - a3*b2*c1*d4 - a4*b1*c2*d3 + a4*b1*c3*d2
00241         - a4*b2*c3*d1 + a4*b2*c1*d3 - a4*b3*c1*d2 + a4*b3*c2*d1;
00242 }
00243 
00244 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00245 template <typename TReal>
00246 inline aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::Inverse()
00247 {
00248     // Compute the reciprocal determinant
00249     const TReal det = Determinant();
00250     if(det == static_cast<TReal>(0.0))
00251     {
00252         // Matrix not invertible. Setting all elements to nan is not really
00253         // correct in a mathematical sense but it is easy to debug for the
00254         // programmer.
00255         const TReal nan = std::numeric_limits<TReal>::quiet_NaN();
00256         *this = aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>(
00257             nan,nan,nan,nan,
00258             nan,nan,nan,nan,
00259             nan,nan,nan,nan,
00260             nan,nan,nan,nan);
00261 
00262         return *this;
00263     }
00264 
00265     const TReal invdet = static_cast<TReal>(1.0) / det;
00266 
00267     aiMatrix4x4t<TReal> res;
00268     res.a1 = invdet  * (b2 * (c3 * d4 - c4 * d3) + b3 * (c4 * d2 - c2 * d4) + b4 * (c2 * d3 - c3 * d2));
00269     res.a2 = -invdet * (a2 * (c3 * d4 - c4 * d3) + a3 * (c4 * d2 - c2 * d4) + a4 * (c2 * d3 - c3 * d2));
00270     res.a3 = invdet  * (a2 * (b3 * d4 - b4 * d3) + a3 * (b4 * d2 - b2 * d4) + a4 * (b2 * d3 - b3 * d2));
00271     res.a4 = -invdet * (a2 * (b3 * c4 - b4 * c3) + a3 * (b4 * c2 - b2 * c4) + a4 * (b2 * c3 - b3 * c2));
00272     res.b1 = -invdet * (b1 * (c3 * d4 - c4 * d3) + b3 * (c4 * d1 - c1 * d4) + b4 * (c1 * d3 - c3 * d1));
00273     res.b2 = invdet  * (a1 * (c3 * d4 - c4 * d3) + a3 * (c4 * d1 - c1 * d4) + a4 * (c1 * d3 - c3 * d1));
00274     res.b3 = -invdet * (a1 * (b3 * d4 - b4 * d3) + a3 * (b4 * d1 - b1 * d4) + a4 * (b1 * d3 - b3 * d1));
00275     res.b4 = invdet  * (a1 * (b3 * c4 - b4 * c3) + a3 * (b4 * c1 - b1 * c4) + a4 * (b1 * c3 - b3 * c1));
00276     res.c1 = invdet  * (b1 * (c2 * d4 - c4 * d2) + b2 * (c4 * d1 - c1 * d4) + b4 * (c1 * d2 - c2 * d1));
00277     res.c2 = -invdet * (a1 * (c2 * d4 - c4 * d2) + a2 * (c4 * d1 - c1 * d4) + a4 * (c1 * d2 - c2 * d1));
00278     res.c3 = invdet  * (a1 * (b2 * d4 - b4 * d2) + a2 * (b4 * d1 - b1 * d4) + a4 * (b1 * d2 - b2 * d1));
00279     res.c4 = -invdet * (a1 * (b2 * c4 - b4 * c2) + a2 * (b4 * c1 - b1 * c4) + a4 * (b1 * c2 - b2 * c1));
00280     res.d1 = -invdet * (b1 * (c2 * d3 - c3 * d2) + b2 * (c3 * d1 - c1 * d3) + b3 * (c1 * d2 - c2 * d1));
00281     res.d2 = invdet  * (a1 * (c2 * d3 - c3 * d2) + a2 * (c3 * d1 - c1 * d3) + a3 * (c1 * d2 - c2 * d1));
00282     res.d3 = -invdet * (a1 * (b2 * d3 - b3 * d2) + a2 * (b3 * d1 - b1 * d3) + a3 * (b1 * d2 - b2 * d1));
00283     res.d4 = invdet  * (a1 * (b2 * c3 - b3 * c2) + a2 * (b3 * c1 - b1 * c3) + a3 * (b1 * c2 - b2 * c1));
00284     *this = res;
00285 
00286     return *this;
00287 }

00289 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00290 template <typename TReal>
00291 inline TReal* aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::operator[](unsigned int p_iIndex) {
00292     if (p_iIndex > 3) {
00293         return NULL;
00294     }
00295     switch ( p_iIndex ) {
00296         case 0:
00297             return &a1;
00298         case 1:
00299             return &b1;
00300         case 2:
00301             return &c1;
00302         case 3:
00303             return &d1;
00304         default:
00305             break;
00306     }
00307     return &a1;
00308 }
00309 
00310 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00311 template <typename TReal>
00312 inline const TReal* aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::operator[](unsigned int p_iIndex) const {
00313     if (p_iIndex > 3) {
00314         return NULL;
00315     }
00316 
00317     switch ( p_iIndex ) {
00318         case 0:
00319             return &a1;
00320         case 1:
00321             return &b1;
00322         case 2:
00323             return &c1;
00324         case 3:
00325             return &d1;
00326         default:
00327             break;
00328     }
00329     return &a1;
00330 }

00333 template <typename TReal>
00334 inline bool aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::operator== (const aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& m) const
00335 {
00336     return (a1 == m.a1 && a2 == m.a2 && a3 == m.a3 && a4 == m.a4 &&
00337             b1 == m.b1 && b2 == m.b2 && b3 == m.b3 && b4 == m.b4 &&
00338             c1 == m.c1 && c2 == m.c2 && c3 == m.c3 && c4 == m.c4 &&
00339             d1 == m.d1 && d2 == m.d2 && d3 == m.d3 && d4 == m.d4);
00340 }

00349 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00350 template<typename TReal>
00351 inline bool aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::Equal(const aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& m, TReal epsilon) const {
00352     return
00353         std::abs(a1 - m.a1) <= epsilon &&
00354         std::abs(a2 - m.a2) <= epsilon &&
00355         std::abs(a3 - m.a3) <= epsilon &&
00356         std::abs(a4 - m.a4) <= epsilon &&
00357         std::abs(b1 - m.b1) <= epsilon &&
00358         std::abs(b2 - m.b2) <= epsilon &&
00359         std::abs(b3 - m.b3) <= epsilon &&
00360         std::abs(b4 - m.b4) <= epsilon &&
00361         std::abs(c1 - m.c1) <= epsilon &&
00362         std::abs(c2 - m.c2) <= epsilon &&
00363         std::abs(c3 - m.c3) <= epsilon &&
00364         std::abs(c4 - m.c4) <= epsilon &&
00365         std::abs(d1 - m.d1) <= epsilon &&
00366         std::abs(d2 - m.d2) <= epsilon &&
00367         std::abs(d3 - m.d3) <= epsilon &&
00368         std::abs(d4 - m.d4) <= epsilon;
00369 }

00371 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00372 
00373 #define ASSIMP_MATRIX4_4_DECOMPOSE_PART         \
00374         const aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& _this = *this;/* Create alias for conveniance. */ \
00375         \
00376         /* extract translation */ \
00377         pPosition.x = _this[0][3]; \
00378         pPosition.y = _this[1][3]; \
00379         pPosition.z = _this[2][3]; \
00380         \
00381         /* extract the columns of the matrix. */ \
00382         aiVector3t<TReal> vCols[3] = { \
00383                 aiVector3t<TReal>(_this[0][0],_this[1][0],_this[2][0]), \
00384                 aiVector3t<TReal>(_this[0][1],_this[1][1],_this[2][1]), \
00385                 aiVector3t<TReal>(_this[0][2],_this[1][2],_this[2][2]) \
00386         }; \
00387         \
00388         /* extract the scaling factors */ \
00389         pScaling.x = vCols[0].Length(); \
00390         pScaling.y = vCols[1].Length(); \
00391         pScaling.z = vCols[2].Length(); \
00392         \
00393         /* and the sign of the scaling */ \
00394         if (Determinant() < 0) pScaling = -pScaling; \
00395         \
00396         /* and remove all scaling from the matrix */ \
00397         if(pScaling.x) vCols[0] /= pScaling.x; \
00398         if(pScaling.y) vCols[1] /= pScaling.y; \
00399         if(pScaling.z) vCols[2] /= pScaling.z; \
00400         \
00401         do {} while(false)
00402

00405 
00406 template <typename TReal>
00407 inline void aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::Decompose (aiVector3t<TReal>& pScaling, aiQuaterniont<TReal>& pRotation,
00408     aiVector3t<TReal>& pPosition) const
00409 {
00410         ASSIMP_MATRIX4_4_DECOMPOSE_PART;
00411 
00412     // build a 3x3 rotation matrix
00413     aiMatrix3x3t<TReal> m(vCols[0].x,vCols[1].x,vCols[2].x,
00414         vCols[0].y,vCols[1].y,vCols[2].y,
00415         vCols[0].z,vCols[1].z,vCols[2].z);
00416 
00417     // and generate the rotation quaternion from it
00418     pRotation = aiQuaterniont<TReal>(m);
00419 }
00420 
00421 template <typename TReal>
00422 inline void aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::Decompose(aiVector3t<TReal>& pScaling, aiVector3t<TReal>& pRotation, aiVector3t<TReal>& pPosition) const
00423 {
00424         ASSIMP_MATRIX4_4_DECOMPOSE_PART;
00425 
00426         /*
00427             |  CE     -CF      D   0 |
00428         M = |  BDE+AF -BDF+AE -BC  0 |
00429             | -ADE+BF -ADF+BE  AC  0 |
00430             |  0       0       0   1 |
00431 
00432         A = cos(angle_x), B = sin(angle_x);
00433         C = cos(angle_y), D = sin(angle_y);
00434         E = cos(angle_z), F = sin(angle_z);
00435         */
00436 
00437         // Use a small epsilon to solve floating-point inaccuracies
00438     const TReal epsilon = 10e-3f;
00439 
00440         pRotation.y  = std::asin(vCols[2].x);// D. Angle around oY.
00441 
00442         TReal C = std::cos(pRotation.y);
00443 
00444         if(std::fabs(C) > epsilon)
00445         {
00446                 // Finding angle around oX.
00447                 TReal tan_x =  vCols[2].z / C;// A
00448                 TReal tan_y = -vCols[2].y / C;// B
00449 
00450                 pRotation.x = std::atan2(tan_y, tan_x);
00451                 // Finding angle around oZ.
00452                 tan_x =  vCols[0].x / C;// E
00453                 tan_y = -vCols[1].x / C;// F
00454                 pRotation.z = std::atan2(tan_y, tan_x);
00455         }
00456         else
00457         {// oY is fixed.
00458                 pRotation.x = 0;// Set angle around oX to 0. => A == 1, B == 0, C == 0, D == 1.
00459 
00460                 // And finding angle around oZ.
00461                 TReal tan_x = vCols[1].y;// -BDF+AE => E
00462                 TReal tan_y = vCols[0].y;//  BDE+AF => F
00463 
00464                 pRotation.z = std::atan2(tan_y, tan_x);
00465         }
00466 }
00467 
00468 #undef ASSIMP_MATRIX4_4_DECOMPOSE_PART
00469 
00470 template <typename TReal>
00471 inline void aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::Decompose(aiVector3t<TReal>& pScaling, aiVector3t<TReal>& pRotationAxis, TReal& pRotationAngle,
00472                                                                                         aiVector3t<TReal>& pPosition) const
00473 {
00474 aiQuaterniont<TReal> pRotation;
00475 
00476         Decompose(pScaling, pRotation, pPosition);
00477         pRotation.Normalize();
00478 
00479         TReal angle_cos = pRotation.w;
00480         TReal angle_sin = std::sqrt(1.0f - angle_cos * angle_cos);
00481 
00482         pRotationAngle = std::acos(angle_cos) * 2;
00483 
00484         // Use a small epsilon to solve floating-point inaccuracies
00485     const TReal epsilon = 10e-3f;
00486 
00487         if(std::fabs(angle_sin) < epsilon) angle_sin = 1;
00488 
00489         pRotationAxis.x = pRotation.x / angle_sin;
00490         pRotationAxis.y = pRotation.y / angle_sin;
00491         pRotationAxis.z = pRotation.z / angle_sin;
00492 }
00493 
00494 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00495 template <typename TReal>
00496 inline void aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::DecomposeNoScaling (aiQuaterniont<TReal>& rotation,
00497     aiVector3t<TReal>& position) const
00498 {
00499     const aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& _this = *this;
00500 
00501     // extract translation
00502     position.x = _this[0][3];
00503     position.y = _this[1][3];
00504     position.z = _this[2][3];
00505 
00506     // extract rotation
00507     rotation = aiQuaterniont<TReal>((aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>)_this);
00508 }
00509 
00510 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00511 template <typename TReal>
00512 inline aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::FromEulerAnglesXYZ(const aiVector3t<TReal>& blubb)
00513 {
00514     return FromEulerAnglesXYZ(blubb.x,blubb.y,blubb.z);
00515 }
00516 
00517 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00518 template <typename TReal>
00519 inline aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::FromEulerAnglesXYZ(TReal x, TReal y, TReal z)
00520 {
00521     aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& _this = *this;
00522 
00523     TReal cr = std::cos( x );
00524     TReal sr = std::sin( x );
00525     TReal cp = std::cos( y );
00526     TReal sp = std::sin( y );
00527     TReal cy = std::cos( z );
00528     TReal sy = std::sin( z );
00529 
00530     _this.a1 = cp*cy ;
00531     _this.a2 = cp*sy;
00532     _this.a3 = -sp ;
00533 
00534     TReal srsp = sr*sp;
00535     TReal crsp = cr*sp;
00536 
00537     _this.b1 = srsp*cy-cr*sy ;
00538     _this.b2 = srsp*sy+cr*cy ;
00539     _this.b3 = sr*cp ;
00540 
00541     _this.c1 =  crsp*cy+sr*sy ;
00542     _this.c2 =  crsp*sy-sr*cy ;
00543     _this.c3 = cr*cp ;
00544 
00545     return *this;
00546 }
00547 
00548 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00549 template <typename TReal>
00550 inline bool aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::IsIdentity() const
00551 {
00552     // Use a small epsilon to solve floating-point inaccuracies
00553     const static TReal epsilon = 10e-3f;
00554 
00555     return (a2 <= epsilon && a2 >= -epsilon &&
00556             a3 <= epsilon && a3 >= -epsilon &&
00557             a4 <= epsilon && a4 >= -epsilon &&
00558             b1 <= epsilon && b1 >= -epsilon &&
00559             b3 <= epsilon && b3 >= -epsilon &&
00560             b4 <= epsilon && b4 >= -epsilon &&
00561             c1 <= epsilon && c1 >= -epsilon &&
00562             c2 <= epsilon && c2 >= -epsilon &&
00563             c4 <= epsilon && c4 >= -epsilon &&
00564             d1 <= epsilon && d1 >= -epsilon &&
00565             d2 <= epsilon && d2 >= -epsilon &&
00566             d3 <= epsilon && d3 >= -epsilon &&
00567             a1 <= 1.f+epsilon && a1 >= 1.f-epsilon &&
00568             b2 <= 1.f+epsilon && b2 >= 1.f-epsilon &&
00569             c3 <= 1.f+epsilon && c3 >= 1.f-epsilon &&
00570             d4 <= 1.f+epsilon && d4 >= 1.f-epsilon);
00571 }
00572 
00573 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00574 template <typename TReal>
00575 inline aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::RotationX(TReal a, aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& out)
00576 {
00577     /*
00578          |  1  0       0       0 |
00579      M = |  0  cos(A) -sin(A)  0 |
00580          |  0  sin(A)  cos(A)  0 |
00581          |  0  0       0       1 |  */
00582     out = aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>();
00583     out.b2 = out.c3 = std::cos(a);
00584     out.b3 = -(out.c2 = std::sin(a));
00585     return out;
00586 }
00587 
00588 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00589 template <typename TReal>
00590 inline aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::RotationY(TReal a, aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& out)
00591 {
00592     /*
00593          |  cos(A)  0   sin(A)  0 |
00594      M = |  0       1   0       0 |
00595          | -sin(A)  0   cos(A)  0 |
00596          |  0       0   0       1 |
00597         */
00598     out = aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>();
00599     out.a1 = out.c3 = std::cos(a);
00600     out.c1 = -(out.a3 = std::sin(a));
00601     return out;
00602 }
00603 
00604 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00605 template <typename TReal>
00606 inline aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::RotationZ(TReal a, aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& out)
00607 {
00608     /*
00609          |  cos(A)  -sin(A)   0   0 |
00610      M = |  sin(A)   cos(A)   0   0 |
00611          |  0        0        1   0 |
00612          |  0        0        0   1 |   */
00613     out = aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>();
00614     out.a1 = out.b2 = std::cos(a);
00615     out.a2 = -(out.b1 = std::sin(a));
00616     return out;
00617 }
00618 
00619 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00620 // Returns a rotation matrix for a rotation around an arbitrary axis.
00621 template <typename TReal>
00622 inline aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::Rotation( TReal a, const aiVector3t<TReal>& axis, aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& out)
00623 {
00624   TReal c = std::cos( a), s = std::sin( a), t = 1 - c;
00625   TReal x = axis.x, y = axis.y, z = axis.z;
00626 
00627   // Many thanks to MathWorld and Wikipedia
00628   out.a1 = t*x*x + c;   out.a2 = t*x*y - s*z; out.a3 = t*x*z + s*y;
00629   out.b1 = t*x*y + s*z; out.b2 = t*y*y + c;   out.b3 = t*y*z - s*x;
00630   out.c1 = t*x*z - s*y; out.c2 = t*y*z + s*x; out.c3 = t*z*z + c;
00631   out.a4 = out.b4 = out.c4 = static_cast<TReal>(0.0);
00632   out.d1 = out.d2 = out.d3 = static_cast<TReal>(0.0);
00633   out.d4 = static_cast<TReal>(1.0);
00634 
00635   return out;
00636 }
00637 
00638 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00639 template <typename TReal>
00640 inline aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::Translation( const aiVector3t<TReal>& v, aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& out)
00641 {
00642     out = aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>();
00643     out.a4 = v.x;
00644     out.b4 = v.y;
00645     out.c4 = v.z;
00646     return out;
00647 }
00648 
00649 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00650 template <typename TReal>
00651 inline aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::Scaling( const aiVector3t<TReal>& v, aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& out)
00652 {
00653     out = aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>();
00654     out.a1 = v.x;
00655     out.b2 = v.y;
00656     out.c3 = v.z;
00657     return out;
00658 }

00660 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00669 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00670 template <typename TReal>
00671 inline aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>::FromToMatrix(const aiVector3t<TReal>& from,
00672     const aiVector3t<TReal>& to, aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& mtx)
00673 {
00674     aiMatrix3x3t<TReal> m3;
00675     aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>::FromToMatrix(from,to,m3);
00676     mtx = aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>(m3);
00677     return mtx;
00678 }
